name: Future in Flames
description:
A supernatural survival game about being lost in the woods, with only a candle and a knack for predestination to guide you. Made in a one week jam.

This is a short prototype, with more story content coming in the future.

Credits:

Alexander Nguyen - Programmer

Annie Zhang - Producer, 3D Artist

Ben Paulsen - Lead Game Designer, Lead Programmer

Isaiah Roberts - 2D Artist

Jose Velarde-Ruiz - Programmer

Lily Pham - 2D Artist

Peyton Jones - Lead Programmer
